disclaimer.title: Medical Notice:
disclaimer.text: This application is for educational and informational purposes only. It does not replace professional medical consultation. Always consult a healthcare professional for diagnoses and treatments.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health and Wellness Promotion
mentalHealth.description: Discover how acupressure techniques can significantly contribute to your emotional balance, stress reduction, sleep improvement and mental wellness promotion. Our holistic approach connects body and mind for a fuller and healthier life.

stress.description: Specific techniques to reduce tension and promote deep relaxation
